channel.title: Mods and rs degrading everyday
channel.description: Ok...im wcing on my skiller at yews in edgeville..theres this lvl 22 mod name e11ama or somethin and we wc for a while..then this lvl 100 mod comes and says **** you..I say reported and then she tells everyone you can;t report for staring out..so basically the whole offensive language system doesnt apply at this point.someone can sit there for hrs saying *** hole **** you..******* noob..I've gotten banned 4 times..perm muted on all 4 accs for staring out..Everyone actually belived her because she had 786m...I think shes a nerd and sad..[br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2007, 05:45:39 PM[/size][hr]Runescape keeps degrading..Pc sucks now..all the mods are crooked..this guy advertised google.com,closed a door while somoene getting attked by tree spirit..he broke item scamming and advertising websites..mod said it;s not item scamming and google.com isn't a website..the lvl 22 mods name is e11ama and she likes to talk in purple:wave: lmao
